info.name: VortexCore
info.description: A minimalistic restyle for the large automotive forum, vwvortex.com.  Also added some minor responsiveness for when working with different sizes of the browser.  This is meant for experienced users that are already confortable navigating the site.  Only set up for within the forums.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1 (Updated 6/14/13) 
Developer: Eric Shell of eshelldesigns.com 

Note: Meant to be used with the addition of Ad Block Plus.
